If someone have problem to make the game working with the cracked RTS.DLL file, post a topic and I tell him how to doit.

If you want to run the game you need to replace the original file RTS.DLL from the ISO (mount first the ISO on Alchool 120%, I don't know if Daemon works, then explore the ISO and you'll see the org. RTS.DLL, that file must replaced with the cracked RTS.DLL.) 
Now, copy the game (not the ISO) to HDD in one new folder (e.g. AEP Expansion) and in this folder you'll see the entire game and here change the RTS.DLL with cracked one. Make the ISO again with WinIso and burn with wathever burning software you have.
Now install the game it should work because it's works for me!
Basically, you need to replace RTS.DLL org file from the ISO with the cracked one.
Regards, sory for the late replay.
